description: Structured information describing a corodinate space.

alias.description: User-defined identifier, often a short name, of this coordinate space.

anatomicalOrientation.description: Axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of location (2D or 3D).

defaultImages.description: Link to default images used to visualize this brain atlas coordinate space.

fullName.description: A descriptive name of this coordinate space.

origin.description: Center of the corodinate system (point where axes intersect; 2D with z = 0).

releaseDate.description: Date of first broadcast/publication/release of this coordinate space.

unit.description: A determinate quantity adopted as a standard of the measurement.

versionIdentifier.description: Version identifier of this coordinate space.
